evening.name: Evening notifications
evening.title: GameLife
messages: Every achievement counts! What milestones did you hit today?
Power up your progress by logging today's adventures now!
Your journey matters! Document today's chapters in the app.
Boost your score! How did you level up in real life today?
Your life's game is ongoing. Ensure every move is tracked. Log now!
Remember, every small activity can earn you points. Did you add yours?
Chase those leaderboards! Make sure to input today's experiences.
Every quest and challenge today brings growth. Have you updated the app?
Jot down your journey! What were today's highs and lows?
Life's a game, and every day is a new turn. Ensure you've played yours by logging in.
Another day, another quest! Make sure to capture all your adventures.
Gathered any power-ups or achievements today? Don't let them slip away, note them!
Your legacy is built one day at a time. Have you logged today's story?
Epic moments await! What epic tales from today will you share in the app?
Score big by noting down your daily wins. Have you checked in yet?

message.half-time: You have half the time left to complete the quest[s]: {}
message.last-time: The following quest[s] are due tomorrow: {}, so hurry up and finish them!
message.today-time: The following quest[s] are finished today: {}, hurry up and finish them!

server.alert-tokenexpired-text: The application will close, please restart it.
server.alert-aderror-message-nomore: There are no more ads available. Try again tomorrow!
server.alert-aderror-message-error: An error has occurred, please try again later.
server.alert-adempty-text: You have no more ads available for today.
server.alert-error-text: An error has occurred, please try again later.

onboarding.page1: Welcome to Game-Life, Turn your routine into a quest. Every day becomes an exciting adventure.
onboarding.page2: Plan and complete your quests. With each achievement, your avatar gains strength.
onboarding.page3: Earn XP for every mission accomplished. Become the champion of your productivity.

conditions.St: Wait for level {} with the statistic "{}"

activity.alert-remove-text: Are you sure you want to eliminate this activity?
activity.alert-wrongtiming-text: The selected activity how or ends during another.
activity.alert-remcomment-text: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
activity.timeralert-cancel-text: Are you sure you want to cancel this activity?
activity.timeralert-tooshort-text: You cannot add an activity of less than 5 minutes
activity.display-fail-text: We're sorry but adding the activity failed (status: {})

home.alert-maintenance-text:
The servers are in maintenance, you can access the application, but online features are temporarily disabled.

Thank you for your patience, everything will come back to normal in a few minutes!
home.alert-error-text: An error has occurred, please try again later.
home.alert-update-text: An update of the application is available
home.alert-newversion-text: You are on a version not available to the public, the online features are disabled until the official release
home.alert-exit-text: Do you want to leave the application?
home.alert-dateerror-text:
It seems that you have changed the date, perhaps in order to cheat?

I count on you to put the right date, I hope it will not happen again!

leaderboard.alert-onlineneed-text: A connection is required to access the ranking!
leaderboard.alert-connectneed-text: To appear in the ranking, log in by entering your email address in the 'Identity' page.

login.page-text: Hello to you, player of your own life, come and join the LVL-UP community
login.input-cgu-text: I have read and agree to the %terms and conditions%.
login.error-login-nonmail: Please enter a valid email address.
login.error-signin-pseudoUsed: This username is already in use.
login.error-signin-pseudoIncorrect: This username is incorrect (4-24 characters, no insults...).
login.error-signin-disagree: Please accept the terms and conditions.
login.alert-limitAccount-text: You can't create more than 3 accounts with one device.
login.alert-limitDevice-title: Too many devices on this account
login.alert-limitDevice-text: You can't have more than 5 devices connected to a single account.
login.alert-deviceRemoved-text: Your device has been removed from your account because you already have the maximum number of devices on this account.

multiplayer.connection-offline: Please connect to the internet and restart the application to access this page.
multiplayer.connection-failed: The connection to the server failed, please try again later.

profile.alert-nowifi-text: You must be connected to the internet to be able to modify your profile, if you are already connected to the internet restart the application
profile.alert-usernamewarning-text: You can only change your username once every {} days, so choose wisely!
profile.alert-alreadyUsed-text: This username is already in use, please choose another one.
profile.alert-alreadyChanged-text: You must wait {} days before you can change it again.
profile.alert-incorrect-text: Your username must be between 4 and 24 characters long, and must not contain any insulting words.
profile.alert-birthtimewarning-text: You can only set a birth date once every {} days, so choose wisely!
profile.alert-birthtimewait-text: You must wait {} days before you can change your date of birth again.

profile-avatar.alert-isequipped-text: You must equip another item in order to sell this one.
profile-avatar.alert-sellconfirm-text: Are you sure you want to sell this item for {} Ox?
profile-avatar.alert-sellfailed-text: Unable to sell the item, an error has occurred, please try again later.
profile-avatar.alert-sellsuccess-text: Congrats! The item "{}" was sold for {} Ox

report.type-activity-text: You can suggest an activity here
report.type-suggest-text: Any suggestion about the application? Share your idea here
report.type-bug-text: Have you seen a bug? Please bring us as much details about it as possible
report.type-message-text: Do you have a message for us? Please send it here
report.alert-success-text: Thank you so much for your feedback!
report.alert-error-text: An error has occurred, please try again later.

settings.alert-disconnect-text: Do you want to log out? Data will only be saved locally
settings.alert-disconnecterror-text: An error has occurred, please check your internet connection or please try again later.
settings.alert-deleteaccount-text: Are you sure you want to delete your account? A confirmation email will be sent to you.
settings.alert-deletedmailsent-text: A confirmation email has been sent to you, check your mailbox.
settings.alert-deletedmailtooearly-text: A confirmation e-mail has already been sent to you, so please wait a few minutes before sending another, and don't forget to check your spam.
settings.alert-deletedfailed-text: The email was not sent, please check your internet connection or try again later.

dailyDeals.popup-buysuccess-text: You have successfully purshased item "{}" for {} Ox
dailyDeals.error-no-items: An error occurred while loading the items for sale, please try again later.

Congratulations! You got the following items:

{}

targetedChests.popup-chest-text: You want to open a {} chest to get an item of type "{}" for {} Ox?
targetedChests.popup-buysuccess-text:
Congratulations! You got the following items:

{}

dyes.popup-dyer-text: Change the apparence of this item?
dyes.popup-dyesuccess-text: You successfully dyed item "{}" for {} Ox
dyes.error-no-dye: There is no dye available, please buy items or try again.

shop.alert-code-text:
You can win codes by:
	- Playing on our Discord server
	- Finding codes in our Tiktok and Youtube videos
	- Winning a contest on Instagram or X
shop.popup-notenoughox-text: You don't have enough Ox to buy this item.
shop.internet-offline-text: You must be connected to the internet!
shop.reward-failed-text: An error has occurred, please retry again later.
shop.reward-wrong-text: The code you entered is incorrect.
shop.reward-success-text: You have obtained the following rewards:

skills.text-empty: Add an activity, the associated skills will appear here

descriptions.int: Intelligence is a very broad statistic, as soon as you use your brain, you train it and therefore gain intelligence points. The main skills to gain intelligence are school work and thinking work.
descriptions.soc: Social competence is a skill that increases when you do activities with other people. For example, team sports or going out with friends.
descriptions.for: Strength is a fairly simple statistic, it increases by doing skills that require it, like bodybuilding, sports or physical jobs for example!
descriptions.end: Stamina is probably the skill that you will improve the fastest! This is a key statistic that improves in almost all sports!
descriptions.agi: Agility is probably the longest statistic to build, it is not often required and improves slowly, the best ways to increase your agility are actis like stretching or yoga.
descriptions.dex: Dexterity is the agility of the fingers, so it improves a lot on precision quests, writing quests on a computer or even with musical instruments.

quest.text-hint-select: Press and hold to select the column
quest.error-title-exists: A quest with this title already exists
quest.alert-remcomment-text: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
quest.alert-remquest-text: Are you sure you want to delete this quest?
quest.alert-remsubquest-text: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
quest.alert-subquestslimit-text: You can't add more than 20 tasks to this quest
quest.alert-back-text: Would you like to return to the home page? Unsaved changes will be lost.

quests.alert-questslimit-text: You have reached the limit of quests, please delete some of them to add more.

wait.wait-internet-text: You must be connected to the internet to be able to connect!
wait.wait-maintenance-text: The servers are currently in maintenance, come back later!
wait.wait-email-text:
An email has been sent to you to authorize your device to connect.

The email may be sent after a few minutes, check your spam.

main.home-1: Hi! I hope you're well. I'm going to introduce you to the applications, follow me!
main.home-2: At the top right you can see your avatar, you can click on it to change your profile, your avatar or see information on your account
main.home-3: Here's the news, starting with a quote chosen by the community and news about the application
main.home-4: This button is used to add the activities you do in real life, you'll see them appear in the calendar and you'll earn experience!
main.home-5: You can also add quests, to add activities more quickly, or follow personal goals
main.home-6: Come here, let's take a look at the calendar
main.calendar-1: This is where all your activities will appear, you can select them to view their details and edit them.
main.calendar-2: You can select another day or navigate between weeks with the arrows
main.calendar-3: And you can click here to display the month calendar
main.calendar-4: Finally, let's go and see the store!
main.shop-1: At the top you can enter a code to get rewards
main.shop-2: Here you can watch an ad to earn Ox for free (Ox are the app's virtual currency)
main.shop-3: Yan can buy Ox with money (this page will be available in future updates!)
main.shop-4: You can spend your Ox here to buy items, which you can equip in your profile - offers change every day!
main.shop-5: In this category, you can buy chests containing a random item. The rarer the chest, the greater the chance of getting a quality item!
main.shop-no-internet: Unfortunately I cannot present the shop to you because you do not have the internet, but you can access it by being connected!
main.home-7:
That's it! Now I'll let you discover the app for yourself, if you need help you can call me by pressing the help buttons!

Good luck, even if I know you don't need it ;)

achievements.1: This is the success page. Discover all the ones you've already achieved, as well as others that are patiently waiting to be revealed.

activity.1: You can filter activities by category: {}
activity.2: You can select an activity here to open the activity panel
activity.3: You can choose to add an activity you've done or plan to do later, or you can set a timer to start the activity now
activity.4: You can click on this component to define the start and duration of the activity
activity.5: Here you can see the experience you'll gain by doing this activity
activity.6: You can add a comment to your activity, for example, to record your feelings or to note important information

profile.1: This is your profile, you can change your personal information here
profile.2: This is your avatar, you can click on it to change your appearance

report.bug: Please provide as many details on the nature of the bug as well as in the conditions in which it appeared (Android/iOS? Connected to the Internet or not? Smartphone or emulator brand?)

shop.dailyDeals: You can spend your Ox here to buy items, which you can equip in your profile - the offers change every day!
shop.randomChests: In this category you can buy chests in which there is a random item, the rare the chest, the more likely you have a quality item!
shop.randomChests-common: For the common chest, there is a strong chance of obtaining an object of common rarity (90%), a probability of 9% for a rare object, 0.99% for an epic object and only 0.01% for alegendary object.
shop.randomChests-rare: With regard to the rare chest, the chances of obtaining a common object are 20%, 75% for a rare object, 4.5% for an epic object and 0.5% for a legendary object.
shop.randomChests-epic: As for the epic chest, it offers 29% chance of obtaining a rare object, 70% for an epic object and 1% for a legendary object;There is no chance to find a common object there.
shop.targetedChests: You can buy targeted chests, in which you are sure you have an item in the category you have chosen!
shop.targetedChests-common: In the common chest, the chances of obtaining an object of common rarity are extremely high at 99%, followed by 0.9% for a rare object and 0.1% for an epic object;It should be noted that there is no chance of finding a legendary object there.
shop.targetedChests-rare: By opening the rare chest, you have 27% chance of obtaining a common object, 70% for a rare object, 2.9% for an epic object and a thin chance of 0.1% for a legendary object.
shop.targetedChests-epic: As for the epic chest, it does not contain common objects and offers 30% chance of obtaining a rare object, 65% for an epic object, and a significant probability of 5% for a legendary object.
shop.dyes: Finally you can modify items that you already have, it costs less than buying new ones!

quest.1: Here you can set the deadline for your quest, or its frequency if it's a recurring one
quest.2: You can link your quest to an activity, which will allow you to gain experience by completing it.
quest.3: You can also add sub-quests to your main quest, to organize yourself better.
quest.4: Finally, you can add a comment to your quest, for example, to note your feelings or to record important information.
